H0.text: where did abraham and his descendants live. Egypt

H1.text: where did abraham and his descendants live. Mesopotamia

H2.text: where did abraham and his descendants live. Arabia

H3.text: where did abraham and his descendants live. Canaan

A4.text: Yahweh promises the land of Canaan to Abraham in the Book of Genesis and eventually delivers it to descendants of Abraham, the Israelites.

A5.text: Abraham, the ancestor of the Israelites, was most likely an Amorite-Aramean, according to some early theories.
